example.english: Please state your age on the application.
example.spanish: Por favor, indica tu edad en la solicitud.

example.english: We studied many ancient writings from the Bronze Age in my anthropology class.
example.spanish: Estudiamos mucha literatura de la Edad de Bronce en mi clase de antropología.

example.english: The air in the city is polluted.
example.spanish: El aire en la ciudad está contaminado.

example.english: He had a certain air of mystery about him.
example.spanish: Él tenía cierto aire de misterio.

example.english: En el zoológico local hay más de 250 animales.
example.spanish: The local zoo is home to more than 250 animals.

example.english: El jinete ensilló el animal y cabalgó hacia el oeste.
example.spanish: The rider saddled the beast and rode off into the west.

example.english: I really need an answer to my question.
example.spanish: De verdad necesito una respuesta a mi pregunta.

example.english: You have to decide and give us an answer by tomorrow at the latest.
example.spanish: Tienen que decidir y darnos una contestación como muy tarde mañana.

example.english: I like red apples, but my sister likes green apples.
example.spanish: A mí me gustan las manzanas rojas, pero a mi hermana le gustan las verdes.

example.english: My mom has an apple in her garden.
example.spanish: Mi mamá tiene un manzano en su jardín.

example.english: My biggest passion in life is art.
example.spanish: Mi pasión más grande es el arte.

example.english: The school specializes in art and music.
example.spanish: El colegio se especializa en las artes y la música.

example.english: The baby slept soundly through the night.
example.spanish: El bebé durmió profundamente toda la noche.

example.english: The babies happily listened to the lullaby.
example.spanish: Los bebes escucharon felizmente la canción de cuna.

example.english: I had to run to catch the ball.
example.spanish: Tuve que correr para atrapar la pelota.

example.english: He shot the ball at the goalkeeper.
example.spanish: Le chutó el balón al portero.

example.english: The bank gave us a mortgage at a low interest rate.
example.spanish: El banco nos concedió una hipoteca a un tipo de interés bajo.

example.english: These plants grow on the banks of rivers and streams.
example.spanish: Estas plantas crecen en las orillas de los ríos y los arroyos.

example.english: I always make the bed when I wake up.
example.spanish: Siempre hago la cama cuando me levanto.

example.english: There are too many pillows on my bed.
example.spanish: Hay demasiadas almohadas en mi lecho.

example.english: My son can't ride a bicycle.
example.spanish: Mi hijo no puede montar en bicicleta.

example.english: Are we bicycling to the park?
example.spanish: ¿Vamos a ir en bicicleta al parque?

example.english: Magpies are among the most intelligent of birds.
example.spanish: Las urracas son algunos de los pájaros más inteligentes.

example.english: The bird crashed into the sliding doors.
example.spanish: El ave se estrelló contra las puertas corredizas.

example.english: After the accident there were blood stains on the road.
example.spanish: Tras el accidente, había manchas de sangre en la carretera.

example.english: We're not of the same blood, but he has always been my father.
example.spanish: No somos de la misma sangre, pero siempre ha sido mi padre.

example.english: My body aches from running.
example.spanish: Me duele el cuerpo de correr.

example.english: They fished another body out of the river this morning.
example.spanish: Sacaron otro cadáver más del río esta mañana.

example.english: The human skeleton is composed of 206 bones.
example.spanish: El esqueleto humano se compone de 206 huesos.

example.english: Sardines have lots of bones.
example.spanish: Las sardinas tienen muchas espinas.

example.english: He's the author of my favorite book.
example.spanish: Es el autor de mi libro favorito.

example.english: I don't know his number, but you can look it up in the book.
example.spanish: No me sé su número, pero lo puedes buscar en la guía.

example.english: He put her gift in a box and wrapped it with tissue paper.
example.spanish: Puso su regalo en una caja y la envolvió con papel de seda.

example.english: We donated a box full of clothing to the homeless shelter.
example.spanish: Donamos un cajón lleno de ropa al centro de acogida.

example.english: Are they going to have a boy or a girl?
example.spanish: ¿Van a tener un niño o una niña?

example.english: The boy next door helped me carry the bags.
example.spanish: El chico de al lado me ayudó a llevar las bolsas.

example.english: It's an impressive building, with 94 levels and a location in the center of the city.
example.spanish: Es un edificio impresionante, con 94 pisos y una ubicación en el centro de la ciudad.

example.english: That new building is a costly monstrosity.
example.spanish: Esa construcción nueva es una monstruosidad costosa.

example.english: We took the bus to the city.
example.spanish: Tomamos el autobús a la ciudad.

example.english: Has the bus arrived yet?
example.spanish: ¿Ya llegó el bus?

example.english: How is your business going at the moment?
example.spanish: ¿Qué tal le van los negocios de momento?

example.english: He is studying international business at the university.
example.spanish: Está estudiando comercio internacional en la universidad.

example.english: I have to make a call to the bank as soon as it opens.
example.spanish: Tengo que hacer una llamada al banco en cuanto abra.

example.english: I got a call from someone in Buenos Aires.
example.spanish: Recibí un llamado de alguien en Buenos Aires.

example.english: This car can go as fast as 150 miles per hour.
example.spanish: Este coche alcanza las 150 millas por hora.

example.english: The car of her dreams is a red convertible.
example.spanish: El carro de sus sueños es un descapotable rojo.

example.english: I saw a cat feeding her kittens today.
example.spanish: Hoy vi una gata amamantando a sus gatitos.

example.english: Many big cats are in danger of extinction.
example.spanish: Muchos de los grandes felinos están en peligro de extinción.

example.english: I would lend you money if I had it, but I don't even have a single cent with me.
example.spanish: Te prestaría dinero si lo tuviera, pero no llevo encima ni un solo centavo.

example.english: The total cost comes to 47 euros and 30 cents.
example.spanish: El precio total son 47 euros y 30 céntimos.

example.english: The 20th century marked the birth of a new era.
example.spanish: El siglo XX marcó el nacimiento de una nueva era.

example.english: In cricket, scoring a century is a great achievement.
example.spanish: En cricket, marcar una centena es un gran logro.

example.english: I am going to buy an ergonomic chair for my desk.
example.spanish: Voy a comprarme una silla ergonómica para mi escritorio.

example.english: That yellow chair does not match your sofa.
example.spanish: Ese sillón amarillo no hace juego con tu sofá.

example.english: In many Spanish towns, the church is found near the central plaza.
example.spanish: En muchos pueblos españoles, la iglesia se encuentra cerca de la plaza central.

example.english: The church of St. Rose of Viterbo is a a good example of Baroque style.
example.spanish: El templo de Santa Rosa de Viterbo es un buen ejemplar del estilo barroco.

example.english: How many degrees does a circle have?
example.spanish: ¿Cuántos grados tiene un círculo?

example.english: The campers sat in a circle around the fire to play the guitar and sing.
example.spanish: Los campistas se sentaron en un círculo alrededor de la hoguera para tocar la guitarra y cantar.

example.english: I have lived in the city my whole life.
example.spanish: He vivido en la ciudad toda mi vida.

example.english: The city ruled that nightclubs must close at 2 am.
example.spanish: La ciudad decretó que las discotecas deben cerrar a las 2 am.

example.english: My English class begins at 9 am.
example.spanish: Mi clase de inglés comienza a las 9 am.

example.english: Teachers complain that classes are too big.
example.spanish: Los profesores se quejan de que las clases son demasiado numerosas.

example.english: She took off her clothes and got in the shower.
example.spanish: Se quitó la ropa y se metió a la ducha.

example.english: to put one's clothes on
example.spanish: vestirse, ponerse la ropa
